A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This movie definitely did not go the way I thought it would and yet I loved it. It is very different from every other Star Wars movie and I completely understands why many people didn't like it. 
So many things happened\, it is dark but there's a lot of humour (which sometimes bothered me I must admit it). 
I absolutely loved all the scenes with Rey and Luke. And it was so cool to see Poe Dameron get more screen time. Some storylines were useless unfortunately.
Carrie Fisher performance was amazing and brought me to tears.
